definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Barroque style suite-one three seater sofa , and two single seater sofas.
sentences.chinese: 巴洛克式沙发，每套有两个单人和一个三人沙发。

sentences.english: The Baroque Car Perfume Series are all masterpieces of the France fragrances.
sentences.chinese: 巴洛克汽车香水，均为法国调香大师的经典杰作。

sentences.english: This period falls between the Baroque and the Romantic periods.
sentences.chinese: 这时期在巴洛克风格和浪漫的期数之间落下。
要哥特黑，还是要巴洛克白？

sentences.english: This is yet another example of the late neoclassic baroque period.
sentences.chinese: 这是新古典主义巴洛克风格的创作。

sentences.english: One key ingredient to the order of music from the baroque and classical periods is math.
sentences.chinese: 巴洛克时期和古典时期的音乐序列的关键构成是数学。

sentences.english: The decorative mirror they put at the entrance is Baroque style.
sentences.chinese: 这面他摆在入口上装饰性的镜子是巴洛克式的。

sentences.english: The simple baroque cathedral with a double tower is the former St Gallen abbey.
sentences.chinese: 巴洛克式双塔大教堂便是过去的圣加仑修道院。

sentences.english: The baroque gave way to a long period of classical architecture.
sentences.chinese: 巴洛克式最后被长寿命的古典建筑所代替。
是巴洛克式的还是浪漫主义的？

sentences.english: They are florid and fresh. The Baroque-style buildings repose tidily . A stone bridge crosses above the river.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的巴洛克建筑，整齐地坐落，石桥从河面横跨。

sentences.english: So study and research production of polyphony is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 因此学习和研究巴洛克复调音乐是必不可少的。

sentences.english: This is a good example of Baroque architecture.
sentences.chinese: 这是一巴洛克式建筑的好例子。

sentences.english: The leading style is Russian baroque.
sentences.chinese: 主导风格是俄罗斯巴洛克式。

sentences.english: Several beloved concertos originated in the late Baroque era.
sentences.chinese: 一些美妙的协奏曲起源于巴洛克晚期。

definition: Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
Bohemia, historical country of central Europe
triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)
Strauss (name)/Johann Strauss (1825-1899), Austrian composer/Richard Strauss (1864-1949), German composer
Handel (name)/George Frideric Handel (1685-1759), German-born Baroque composer, naturalized British in 1727
